name: CANVAS (DemonicTruffle)
description:
Set in the monochromatic city of Noir York, No. 1 graffiti artist Shad Casper rediscovers colour and uses it to fight back against the powers who have stolen it from the world.

Credits:

Programming by Marc Lablan and Erik Johansson.

Art by Ezekiel Ah Ching-Lava, Zoe Ferstat and Sean Gillies.
